Articles.Content:
I have been seeing a lot of people asking for updates on mod development lately and would like to remind everyone that the holidays are upon us. People are going to be seeing family, traveling, and probably working less on mod updates and posting releases. Keep this in mind before posting "Do you have an update for us" on any of the threads. Remember that all of us have some sort of life outside of playing KSP and mod development, and to just exercise some patience. Thanks.

Edited December 1, 2013 by sharpspoonful
Spelling and clarity.

... Remember that SOME of us have some sort of life outside of playing KSP and mod development ...

There... FTFY
